item.title: 2 PROBLEMS and hopefully 2 SOLUTIONS

@lov3_rs_money wrote:

well heres the bit for wen u die,
client.java

ApplyDead();
                        teleportToX = 3693;
			teleportToY = 3468;
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

player.java
then search for updateThisPlayerMovement() then change those co-ords
hope it helped!!

lov3_rs_money

item.title: 2 PROBLEMS and hopefully 2 SOLUTIONS
item.dc:creator: @Marc323909 Marc323909
item.description:
@Marc323909 wrote:

Ok so far my server is going great but
1:i want to change where people spawn when they start eg
insted of x 3287 y 2754
i want new players to spawn at x 3693 y 3468 so the new account player will spawn at those cords

2: ::home ok i want the chnage the ::home cords from x 5758 y 3485
to x 3693 y 3468 so that when people do ::home they go to the house

if anyone helps me i will be very very very greatfull!
